rComments: good teacher, different readings from lots of different authors. not really any lecture breaks. gives handouts with all midterm and final material. easy if you keep up on readings and go to lecture

Half of the reason I go to this class is because he's SEXY. The class itself isn't bad. The material is interesting and he presents it in a way that's easy to absorb. although his teaching style is elementary, I don't find it off-putting.

sweet lord..one more unnecessary lecture break and i think my head is going to explode. i appreciate that he thinks real life skills are important, i do, but taking time out of learning what i really came to class to learn (aka ancient art of mexico) to do things like finger exercises and note-taking lessons is killing me.

According to other HAVC students, many other professors dislike professor Cole's somewhat elementary teaching skills, and I cannot agree more.  The "learning breaks" are a waste of time, considering the huge amount of people in the lecture hall.  My only motivation to go to class is to bask in his HOTNESS, my goodness this man is FINE.

If you're a HAVC major, you'll want to die a slow death in this class. Cole runs the class like a 150 person fourth grade class. If you text, you can get kicked out. We do "learning breaks" every 30 mins, and our recommended reading is two "inspirational" books on life. Seriously, this is not a 160 course.
